channel.title: Loreshelf - notes organizer
channel.description: Recent content on Loreshelf - notes organizer

item.title: Community
item.description: Community Topics Staying informed Code contribution Issue reporting Staying informed Follow and join us on Loreshelf Subreddit. Code contribution Loreshelf is an Open Source project licensed under the GNU General Public License v3. The source code is hosted on GitHub. Issue reporting Look up and report found Loreshelf issues on GitHub.

item.title: License
item.description: License Updated 8/31/2020 Loreshelf is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; version 3 of the License. Loreshelf is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

item.title: What's new
item.description: What's new Find out what's new in the latest Loreshelf release. Changelog v1.0 - September 3th, 2020 This is the initial release of Loreshelf. New Feature Slash Commands Add new content with slash commands. For example headers, tables, icons, quotes, and more. New Feature Mentions Mention and link to the related information across notebooks and workspaces.
